name: MSCRMGetOnlineInstanceByName
description: Gets PowerApps/CDS/Dynamics 365 environment Id based on the name of the environment
author: Wael Hamze

inputs.name: apiUrl
inputs.label: ApiUrl
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use the Service Url for your environment region as per (documentation)[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/developer/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api]

inputs.name: instanceName
inputs.label: InstanceName
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique instance name. E.g. for :https://contoso.crm.dynamics.com, the value would be: contoso

inputs.name: vstsInstanceIdOutputVariableName
inputs.label: VstsInstanceIdOutputVariableName
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the VSTS variable you want populated with the instance id that is returned.  Do not use $(variableName).  Instead just use variableName.
